comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Carl Gottlieb Bünz Prominent German diplomat and head of the Hamburg-America line in New York, convicted in 1915 of conspiracy in connection with supplying German ships after the outbreak of war in 1914. Died in federal prison in 1918. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Gottlieb_B%C3%BCnz

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the extra information artolog. I'm going to ask that we add his middle name, Gottlieb, to the record. Also I'll ask that we add the alternate spellings of his name, "Carl" and "Bünz".
